nodes.text: The KSE-H44 A-wing pilot helmet was a model of flight helmet that was used by Rebel Alliance A-wing pilots. After the Battle of Endor, at least two of these helmets were deemed surplus and were repurposed for use by Leia Organa and Luke Skywalker, during Skywalker's training of his sister on Ajan Kloss. During her own training of the scavenger Rey, Organa uncovered the helmets for use, after they had laid unused for years.
